data.expected_result: It says "USER made changes to SERVER_NAME"
data.short_description: Making a change to a server (such as renaming it) incorrectly shows the name of the server in the audit log
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server so you have empty audit logs - Modify the @everyone role (grant it any permission) - Modify the server (Rename it/Change the AFK channel) - Observe the audit log for the modification of the server
